function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Biased risk perception due to uncertainty about COVID-19","Impact":"Behavioral decisions deviate from rationality, leading to serious social and economic consequences","Mitigation":"Improving public understanding of COVID-19 through education and transparent communication","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, informational websites, social media outreach","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited understanding of the new disease (COVID-19)","Impact":"Inaccurate risk assessment and decision-making","Mitigation":"Investing in research and data collection to improve understanding of COVID-19","Technologies":"Biomedical research, data analytics, epidemiological studies","People":"Scientists, researchers","Owner":"Government funding agencies"},{"Description":"Influence of social and cultural perspectives on risk perception","Impact":"Amplification or attenuation of individual responses to risk events based on social environment","Mitigation":"Incorporating cultural sensitivity and diversity into risk communication strategies","Technologies":"Cultural competency training, community engagement programs","People":"Diverse cultural and social groups","Owner":"Community organizations, public health agencies"}]}
